address.label: Street Address
address.placeholder: Enter your home address (not a PO Box number)

answer.label: Answer
answer.required: An answer to the question must be specified.
answer.minlength: An answer must contain at least two characters
answer.maxlength: An answer may be no longer than 50 characters

confirmpassword.label: New password confirmation
confirmpassword.minlength: Your confirmation password is required to be at least 5 characters
confirmpassword.maxlength: Your confirmation password cannot be longer than 50 characters

email.label: E-mail
email.minlength: Your e-mail is required to be at least 5 characters
email.maxlength: Your e-mail cannot be longer than 100 characters

firstname.label: First Name
firstname.minlength: Your first name is required to be at least 2 characters
firstname.maxlength: Your first name cannot be longer than 50 characters

groupemail.label: Group E-mail
groupemail.placeholder: An e-mail address to send a confirmation link to
groupemail.minlength: An e-mail address must be at least 5 characters
groupemail.maxlength: An e-mail address may be not longer than 100 characters

groupname.label: Group Name
groupname.required: A group name must be specified.
groupname.minlength: A group name must be at least 2 characters.
groupname.maxlength: A group name must be no more than 50 characters.

lastname.label: Last Name
lastname.minlength: Your last name is required to be at least 2 characters
lastname.maxlength: Your last name cannot be longer than 50 characters

newpassword.label: New password
newpassword.minlength: Your password is required to be at least 5 characters
newpassword.maxlength: Your password cannot be longer than 50 characters

question.label: Secret Question
question.required: A secret question must be specified.
question.minlength: A question must contain at least two characters
question.maxlength: A question can be no longer than 100 characters

telephone.label: Telephone
telephone.minlength: Your telephone number is required to be at least 5 characters
telephone.maxlength: Your telephone number cannot be longer than 50 characters

username.label: Login
username.placeholder: Enter a unique username, maybe your email address?
username.minlength: Your login is required to be at least 1 character
username.maxlength: Your login cannot be longer than 50 characters

message.group.registration.intro: Upon completion of the registration process, you will receive an email setting out the conditions of use of this service.
message.register: You don't have an account yet? Register a new account
message.browsehappy: You are using an outdated browser. Please upgrade your browser to improve your experience.

info.footer: © Copyright 2014, Arthur Vernon. Last updated on May 29, 2014.

question.geodsea: If you have any question on Geo d'Sea:

participant.saved: Registration saved! Please check your email for confirmation.
participant.nameInUse: Login name already registered! Please choose another one.

group.success: The group has been registered. Please check your email for confirmation and click on the link to activate this group.
group.fail: Registration failed! Please check your input and try again.
group.nameInUse: This name is already registered! Please choose another one.

license.lookup.failed: Failed to obtain details from the licensor. Press cancel and complete the form.

authenticate.failed: Authentication failed! Please check your credentials and try again.

password.mismatch: The password and its confirmation do not match!

messages.success: Your user has been activated. Please authenticate.
messages.error: Your user could not be activated. Please use the registration form to sign up.
An error has occured! Settings could not be saved.

firstname.minlength: Your first name is required to be at least one character
firstname.maxlength: Your first name cannot be longer than 50 characters

lastname.minlength: Your last name is required to be at least one character
lastname.maxlength: Your last name cannot be longer than 50 characters

messages.error: An error has occured! The password could not be changed.
An error has occured! The session could not be invalidated.

errors.title: Error page!
errors.403: You are not authorized to access the page.

overview.headline: Geo d'Sea provides the boating community with communication and monitoring tools that save both time and money.

benefits.leadin: You can use this service as a:
benefits.skipper:
To keep sea rescue and friends informed about your journey.
Receive noticies relevant to your location.
benefits.rescue:
To maintain a watch and manage an area of operations.
Receive alerts when vessels are overdue.
benefits.friend:
To track the location of people on-board the boat.
Exchange messages with each other.
Be informed of events relating to the vessel.
benefits.club: To track the location of participants.

HOME.description: Vessel is kept at a person's home.
HOME.name: Home

PEN.description: The vessel is in a boat pen.
PEN.name: Boat Pen

BOAT_YARD.description: The vessel is stored in a boat yard.
BOAT_YARD.name: Boat Yard

STACKER.description: The vessel is stored in a stacker.
STACKER.name: Stacker

MOORING.description: The vessel is tied off at a mooring.
MOORING.name: Mooring

JETTY.description: The vessel is tied up alongside a jetty.
JETTY.name: Jetty

BOW_RIDER.description: A boat where there is a seating section in front of the windscreen.
BOW_RIDER.name: Bow Rider

HALF_CABIN.description: Enclosed section in the front of the boat, e.g. with bunks.
HALF_CABIN.name: Half Cabin

WALK_AROUND.description: Enclosed centre console with the ability to walk abound the deck.
WALK_AROUND.name: Walk Around

CENTER_CONSOLE.description: Basic kind of boat with a steering wheel and console suitable for fishing/diving with lots of surronding deck space.
CENTER_CONSOLE.name: Center Console

OPEN_BOAT.description: No superstructure, like and aluminium of riberglass dinghy.
OPEN_BOAT.name: Open Boat

FLY_BRIDGE.description: Larger vessel with an elevated platform to skipper the vessel from.
FLY_BRIDGE.name: Fly Bridge

PERSONAL_WATER_CRAFT.description: Motorised still but limited for one or two people, e.g. a Jet ski
PERSONAL_WATER_CRAFT.name: Personal Water Craft

OPEN_COCKPIT.description: Like a racing yacht - has no cockpit or superstructure, e.g. catemaran or mono-hull with self draining deck.
OPEN_COCKPIT.name: Open Cockpit

CABIN.description: Standard sailing/cruisiung yacht with sleeping quarters.
CABIN.name: Cabin

hin.label: Hull Identification Number
hin.required: Your hull identification number is required
hin.minlength: A hull identification number is no less than 12 digits long
hin.maxlength: A hull identification number is no more than 14 digits long

name.label: Vessel Name
name.minlength: A name must be at least 5 characters long
name.maxlength: A name may not be more than 40 characters long

length.label: Length (m)
length.required: Length of the vessel is required.
length.nan: This is not a valid number.
length.range: Length must be in the range 1-80 metres.

fuelcapacity.label: Fuel Capacity (l)
fuelcapacity.required: Fuel capacity is required for motorised vessels.
fuelcapacity.nan: This is not a valid number.
fuelcapacity.range: Length must be in the range 0-1000 litres.

messages.error: An error has occurred! Vessel could not be saved.
messages.nolicensorws: This agency does not provide this service! You must enter the details manually.

remove.authenticated:
If you want to authenticate, you can try the default accounts:
- Admnistrator (login="admin" and password="admin")
- User (login="user" and password="user").
